title: Add an option to split a shard evenly w.r.t. the documents
description:
Split shard should have an option to create sub-shards on the basis of doc distribution i.e. in a way that creates evenly distributed sub-shards.

Right now, the split assumes uniform distribution of data over the hash range, but that might not always be true. Having a mechanism that makes a best effort for non-uniformly distributed data would be a useful addition.
